summary: This document is a Durable Power of Attorney for Jeffrey E. Epstein, authorizing Harry Boller to act on his behalf regarding various financial matters with J.P. Morgan. It outlines the powers granted to the attorney-in-fact, including managing accounts, engaging in transactions, and making financial decisions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the individual granting the Durable Power of Attorney, allowing Harry Boller to manage his financial affairs.

persons.name: Harry Boller
persons.context: Boller is designated as the attorney-in-fact for Epstein, authorized to act on his behalf in financial matters.

connections.description: Epstein authorizes Boller to act on his behalf through the Durable Power of Attorney.

keyFacts: The document is a Durable Power of Attorney executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Harry Boller is authorized to manage Epstein's financial accounts and make decisions on his behalf.
The Power of Attorney remains effective until revoked by Epstein or upon his death.
The document outlines various financial powers granted to the attorney-in-fact, including managing banking and investment accounts.
Notarization is required for the Power of Attorney to be valid.
